title: priyulAra vinavaNTi
sahitya:
priyulAra vinavaNTi nAmATa


caraNam 1    shiva krpa kOriyE sImasIma tirugucu shiva pUjalennO jEsiri
shilalanta cilalE gAni shivuDO shuivuDO hariyO mA hrdayamulOnE
    caraNam 2    daivamu okaTani tIrpuga ceppindi daivamulennO darimilA Ayindi
daiva padAniki dIrghamuga tatvam telisinavAriki teliyunu satyam
    caraNam 3    unnati kOriyE sannidhiki pOtE unnati dorakunA uttamulAra
kannaDa jEyaka talapeTTu okasAri cinmayam vEDitE tanmayamE dAri
